sub_title: Manager Process Engineering Department at Danieli Corus
summary:
Experienced Process Engineer with special knowledge in the field of gas cleaning, environmental techniques, metal recycling (especially dezincing) and many standard process operation such as (bulk) storage, materials handling, pumping, heating, cooling etc. 

Since 2016 (chemical) safety became part of my work. I was trained as HAZOP/SIL chairman and followed the Certified Chemical Safety Expert (CCSE) course. I am registered at www.ccse.nl

Familiar with all steps in the process of getting a project done:
Studies, Sales Support, Basic Engineering, Detail Engineering, HAZOP's, Cold- and Hot- Commissioning, Trouble Shooting.

Specialties: Dezincing, Wet- and Dry- desulphurisation, metal recycling, Dry HF scrubbing, waste water treatment

profile_positions.description: Product Technology Manager Gas Cleaning for the Iron, Steel and Aluminium Industry. Responsible for internal and external R&D activities, Marketing & Sales Support, Customer relations, Technology know-how.
profile_positions.title: Technology Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Senior Process Engineer, Commissioning Manager & Project Manager for projects in:

Primary Iron & steel industry - Blast Furnace design, PCI, coal grinding, (wet) gas scrubbing, BF cooling systems, primary & secondary dedusting BOF shops  (CORUS, US Steel, DK Roheisen, Tata Steel, Arcelor Mittal)

Power production plants - Fluegas Desulphurization (NUON, Essent)

Primary Aluminium industry - HF Dry Scrubbing, Fluegas Desulphurization and dust removal (Rio Tinto Alcan, Hydro, Alcoa, Hindalco, Ma'aden, Tomago)
profile_positions.title: Senior Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Process Engineer & Project Manager for projects in:

Modifications to Desulphurization unit for Power generation plant (NUON)
Sinterplant Scrubber optimization for Primary metal industry (CORUS)
Increase capacity of Scrap Recycling plant & Study (CED, Senter NOVEM)
Isolator Start-up & Commissioning Pharmaceutical industry (MSD)
Industrial and municipal water treatment
Design for continuous oxidation of lineseed oil for Forbo, Assendelft (Nl)
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Process Engineering, Commissioning and R&D for:

Design and Commissioning of Flue Gas Desulphurization & DeNOx units for Power Generation plants (NUON, EPZ, Electrabel, EDF (Fr), CEZ (CZ), Belchatow (Pl).
Design, Commissioning and Trouble Shooting for Dezincing plants: CED (Fr), Detinning plants: BOF (B) and NOF
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Research, study and consultant for Hoogovens (now TATA Steel, IJmuiden) waste water treatment in:

Coke plant nr. 2 (COD removal, fluidised bed testing & PAH removal)
Municipal waste water from Hoogovens site collection and treatment
BF waste water & granulation water

volunteer_experiences.role: Balkenier & Coordinator West (part of the Netherlands), Organizer BALK Festival West

company.name: Stichting BALK - Bond voor Amateurmuziektheater en Lichte Koormuziek

volunteer_experiences.description: Together with other enthousiasts I founded the A Cappella and contemporary Choral Society "BALK" in 1999. In the first 5 years I was on the board of this society and started several activities of which the BALK West Festival was the largest activity. Currently I coordinate activities within the West region. BALK is quite succesful; currently more than 15000 singers within over 500 groups joined BALK. BALK now employs 3 part-time employees.

Founder and active member of A Cappella quintet Brothers-4-Tune. The quintet has won both national and international prices. The group is best known for the humor they put into their performances. This explains that their motto is "A Cappella is fun!!!" Please refer to their website www.brothers4tune.com
